p: In a Chinese study that analyzed the EOs from leaves and stem (aerial parts), the main components were ( E)-isoeugenol (10.3–44.8%), δ-cadinol (9.32%), caryophyllene oxide (8.78%), spathulenol (8.00%), propiopiperone (5.75%), α-cadinol (5.62%), caryophyllenol II (3.06%), and δ-cadinene (2.91%) [ 34].
